description: Imagine the Fitz Roy skyline at sunset with stacked sets marching in. The Skyline Stencil graphic is screen-printed on a hoody made from 100% postconsumer recycled fabric. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, we reduce our reliance on virgin raw materials. Made in a Fair Trade Certified™ factory. <br><br>To get the best fit for their gender-inclusive styles, if you’re usually a men’s size medium, stick with size medium or M. If women’s small is your go-to size, they suggest extra small or XS.
name: Skyline Stencil Uprisal Full Zip Hoody - Unisex
